DC CODE § 47-351.12

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, all information submitted by a financial institution to the Mayor, or the CFO pursuant to § 47-351.02(c), shall be available for public inspection and reproduction during regular business hours.
Proprietary financial and commercial information of any financial institution shall be kept confidential.
A breach of confidentiality shall be subject to the penalties set forth in § 47-351.15.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Budget and Financial Management; Borrowing; Deposit of Funds.
